text: American Sniper is a 2014 American drama movie. It is directed by Clint Eastwood. It is based on a book by Chris Kyle called American Sniper: The Autobiography of the Most Lethal Sniper in U.S. Military History. It stars Bradley Cooper in the leading role with Sienna Miller. It was released to positive reviews on December 25, 2014. The movie was nominated for six awards at the 2015 Oscars. == References == Category:2014 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Iraq Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies based on the September 11 attacks
title: American Sniper
